name: Jacobean Drama
description: This course explores English drama from the death of Queen Elizabeth I to the closing of the theatres, with attention to such playwrights as Jonson, Middleton, Shakespeare, and Webster. As part of this course, students may have the option of participating in an international learning experience that will have an additional cost and application process. [36L]
prerequisites: 1.0 credit in ENG and 3.0 additional credits.
